Escapade Music Festival Drops Stacked 2022 Lineup Ahead of Three-Day Fest

Posted by Brittany Prevost on February 2, 2022

TICKETS

They say, "go big or go home" - and that's exactly the mindset Escapade Music Festival's team had in mind when curating this year's lineup! Following last year's successful festival (that took place during a pandemic nonetheless), the organizers wasted no time planning the now highly-anticipated 2022 edition. The official lineup was recently revealed and it truly speaks for itself!

Fans can expect special performances by big-name artists such as Above & Beyond, Alan Walker, Cosmic Gate, deadmau5, DJ Snake, Don Diablo, Excision, ILLENIUM, John Summit, Kaskade, Markus Schulz, Martin Garrix, Nicky Romero, Sam Feldt, Seven Lions, SVDDEN DEATH, Tiësto and so many more! We're also so thrilled to see talented local artists on the bill. Flag fam, you have to check out the complete lineup below...

Although the event took place last September, this year's edition will be back to its regularly scheduled weekend in June spanning during a soon-to-be epic three-day adventure. Words can't even begin express how excited we are to have festivals back in Ottawa, our nation's capital - let alone one as monumental as Escapade!

Be sure to grab your tickets starting tomorrow, February 3rd, 2022, at 12 p.m. EST, before it's too late. No, seriously, the festival is already 50% sold out and with a lineup as incredible as this one and Escapade's acclaimed production guaranteed, there are no doubts in our minds that it will sell out! If you're feeling lucky, be sure to enter their official contest in which you could win $2,000 cash, 4 VIP passes, and one hotel for the weekend for you and 3 of your friends - here!

Written By Brittany Prevost
